titles.title: Promoting Charitable Actions Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for 4 years the enhanced charitable deduction for contributions of food inventory.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/20/2007--Introduced. Promoting Charitable Actions Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2011 the expansion of the tax deduction for charitable contributions of food inventory to taxpayers other than C corporations.
